physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal delivery in cephalic position without asphyxia. Developmental milestones were normal. No episode of otitis media.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 19 months of age, remained markedly short with severe mesomelia and moderate rhizomelia. Exhibited normal weight and head circumference.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Exhibited severe short stature but had normal weight and head circumference. Both hands showed ulnar deviation, and there was no clinically recognizable short metacarpal or cubitus valgus. Normal hearing acuity.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient remained markedly short with persistent severe mesomelia and moderate rhizomelia.
